history.content:
Interested in the world of venture capital and entrepreneurship? 

Compete in the 2020-21 BerkeleyHaas Venture Capital Investment Competition!

 

VCIC is a national venture capital investing competition that exposes undergraduate student teams to the world of venture capital.

 

You will be able to: 

1. Evaluate startup pitches & attend trainings from entrepreneurs

2. Interact and network with Senior VC's

3. Learn how to conduct due diligence and term sheet negotiation 

4. Represent Cal with your peers in the regional and national competitions in Spring 2021!

 

If you’re interested in participating, please fill out this VCIC Interest Form: https://tinyurl.com/VCIC2021. Our Info Session and Team Mixer will take place on Tuesday, December 1st at 7pm PST, where we will discuss important application information including deadlines and news about the upcoming tournament season. Applications will be released December 1st and due December 11th. 

 

If you have any questions, please email undergradvcic@gmail.com and check out the website & Facebook.

 

We look forward to seeing you all at the info session! 

 

Best, 

Undergraduate VCIC Executive Committee
history.subject: Undergraduate Haas Venture Capital Competition
